LanguageData.MySonDied.stages.0.label: my son died
LanguageData.MySonDied.stages.0.description: My son is dead. My own flesh and blood...

LanguageData.MyDaughterDied.stages.0.description: My daughter is dead. My own flesh and blood...
LanguageData.MyHusbandDied.stages.0.label: my husband died
LanguageData.MyHusbandDied.stages.0.description: My husband is dead. I am alone.
LanguageData.MyWifeDied.stages.0.label: my wife died
LanguageData.MyWifeDied.stages.0.description: My wife is dead. I am alone.
LanguageData.MyFianceDied.stages.0.label: my fiance died
LanguageData.MyFianceDied.stages.0.description: My fiance died. Such a man... my future is gone.
LanguageData.MyFianceeDied.stages.0.label: my fiancée died
LanguageData.MyFianceeDied.stages.0.description: My fiancée died. Such a woman... my future is gone.
LanguageData.MyLoverDied.stages.0.label: my lover died
LanguageData.MyLoverDied.stages.0.description: My lover died. I am so alone.

LanguageData.MyBrotherDied.stages.0.description: My brother died. My own flesh and blood...

LanguageData.MyFatherDied.stages.0.label: my father died
LanguageData.MyFatherDied.stages.0.description: My father died. He's gone forever.
LanguageData.MyMotherDied.stages.0.label: my mother died
LanguageData.MyMotherDied.stages.0.description: My mother died. She's gone forever.
LanguageData.MyNieceDied.stages.0.label: my niece died
LanguageData.MyNieceDied.stages.0.description: My niece died. Such a wonderful child.

LanguageData.MyNephewDied.stages.0.description: My nephew died. Such a wonderful child.

LanguageData.MyKinDied.stages.0.label: my kin died
LanguageData.BondedAnimalDied.stages.0.label: bonded animal died
LanguageData.BondedAnimalDied.stages.0.description: Such a tender, unique animal. This universe is evil!
LanguageData.PawnWithGoodOpinionDied.stages.0.label: my friend died
LanguageData.PawnWithGoodOpinionDied.stages.0.descrip: Such a wonderful person. The universe gets darker every day.
LanguageData.PawnWithBadOpinionDied.stages.0.label: my rival died
LanguageData.PawnWithBadOpinionDied.stages.0.descript: Serves them right. Things are looking up.
LanguageData.GotMarried.stages.0.label: got married
LanguageData.GotMarried.stages.0.description: I got married! Life is full of possibility!
LanguageData.GotSomeLovin.stages.0.label: got some lovin’
LanguageData.GotSomeLovin.stages.0.description: There's nothing like a tumble between the sheets to lift the mood.
LanguageData.AttendedWedding.stages.0.label: attended wedding
LanguageData.AttendedWedding.stages.0.description: It was great to see two people come together to build a future like that.
LanguageData.AttendedParty.stages.0.label: attended party
LanguageData.AttendedParty.stages.0.description: I had a good time at that party.
